Key Match Events: Bam Adebayo posted a game-high 32 points on 12-of-24 shooting, including 3-of-5 from 3-point range, and added 14 rebounds, two assists, one block, and one steal.
Jimmy Butler contributed 18 points, eight rebounds, and four assists.
Tyler Herro and Alec Burks each scored 15 points.
Terry Rozier tallied 12 points and four assists.
Bilal Coulibaly was the standout for the Wizards with a team-high 22 points, eight rebounds, and two assists.
Alex Sarr had 17 points, six rebounds, three assists, and four blocks.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The game was held in Mexico City.
Miami Heat secured their third victory of the season and their first double-digit victory.
Pelle Larsson got his first real minutes of the season due to Duncan Robinson's absence for personal reasons.
First-round rookie Kel’el Ware saw three minutes of action at the end of the game.
Thomas Bryant played primary backup big minutes behind Adebayo.
